Problem:    Tiny build fails.
Solution:   Always include vim_time().

patch 7.4.2114
Problem:    Tiny build fails.
Solution:   Always include vim_time().

attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.2115
Problem:    Loading defaults.vim with -C argument.
Solution:   Don't load the defaults script with -C argument.  Test sourcing
            the defaults script.  Set 'display' to "truncate".
attachments.title: patch 7.4.2115
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.2115
Problem:    Loading defaults.vim with -C argument.
Solution:   Don't load the defaults script with -C argument.  Test sourcing
            the defaults script.  Set 'display' to "truncate".

attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.2116
Problem:    The default vimrc for Windows is very conservative.
Solution:   Use the defaults.vim in the Windows installer.
attachments.title: patch 7.4.2116
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.2116
Problem:    The default vimrc for Windows is very conservative.
Solution:   Use the defaults.vim in the Windows installer.

attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.2117
Problem:    Deleting an augroup that still has autocmds does not give a
            warning.  The next defined augroup takes its place.
Solution:   Give a warning and prevent the index being used for another group
            name.
attachments.title: patch 7.4.2117
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.2117
Problem:    Deleting an augroup that still has autocmds does not give a
            warning.  The next defined augroup takes its place.
Solution:   Give a warning and prevent the index being used for another group
            name.

attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.2118
Problem:    Mac: can't build with tiny features.
Solution:   Don't define FEAT_CLIPBOARD unconditionally. (Kazunobu Kuriyama)
attachments.title: patch 7.4.2118
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.2118
Problem:    Mac: can't build with tiny features.
Solution:   Don't define FEAT_CLIPBOARD unconditionally. (Kazunobu Kuriyama)

attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.2119
Problem:    Closures are not supported.
Solution:   Capture variables in lambdas from the outer scope. (Yasuhiro
            Matsumoto, Ken Takata)
attachments.title: patch 7.4.2119
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.2119
Problem:    Closures are not supported.
Solution:   Capture variables in lambdas from the outer scope. (Yasuhiro
            Matsumoto, Ken Takata)

attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.2120
Problem:    User defined functions can't be a closure.
Solution:   Add the "closure" argument. Allow using :unlet on a bound
            variable. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, Ken Takata)
attachments.title: patch 7.4.2120
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.2120
Problem:    User defined functions can't be a closure.
Solution:   Add the "closure" argument. Allow using :unlet on a bound
            variable. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto, Ken Takata)

attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.2121
Problem:    No easy way to check if lambda and closure are supported.
Solution:   Add the +lambda feature.
attachments.title: patch 7.4.2121
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.2121
Problem:    No easy way to check if lambda and closure are supported.
Solution:   Add the +lambda feature.
